content:
ChannelFactoryBase Class

In this Article

Provides a common base implementation for all custom channel factories.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class ChannelFactoryBase : System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelManagerBase, System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • CommunicationObject
  • System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelManagerBase
  • ChannelFactoryBase

Remarks

Use this base class to create a custom channel factory.

The ChannelFactoryBase class derives from the ChannelManagerBase class and implements the IChannelFactory interface for creating channels. The methods handle parameter validation and then delegate to protected, virtual or abstract methods that derived classes can override.

Each of the protected virtual methods is automatically synchronized with respect to the other methods on the IChannelFactory interface (including the state transition methods). This means that no additional locking is required to ensure that the object is in a consistent state inside the method body.

Constructors summary

ChannelFactoryBase()

Initializes a new instance of the ChannelFactoryBase class.
ChannelFactoryBase(IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts)

Initializes a new instance of the ChannelFactoryBase class with specified default communication timeouts.

Properties summary

DefaultCloseTimeout

Gets the default interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.
DefaultOpenTimeout

Gets the default interval of time provided for an open operation to complete.
DefaultReceiveTimeout

Gets the default interval of time provided for a receive operation to complete.
DefaultSendTimeout

Gets the default interval of time provided for a send operation to complete.

Methods summary

GetProperty<T>()

Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.
OnAbort()

Inserts processing on a communication object after it transitions to the closing state due to the invocation of a synchronous abort operation.
OnBeginClose(TimeSpan,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation to close each of the channels that were created by the factory.
OnClose(TimeSpan)

Inserts processing on a communication object after it transitions into the opening state which must complete within a specified interval of time.
OnEndClose(IAsyncResult)

Completes an asynchronous operation to close channels that were opened by the factory.

Constructors

  • ChannelFactoryBase()

    Initializes a new instance of the ChannelFactoryBase class.

    protected ChannelFactoryBase ();

    Remarks

    The default constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages. The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation. Use ChannelFactoryBase(IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts) if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.

  • ChannelFactoryBase(IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts)

    Initializes a new instance of the ChannelFactoryBase class with specified default communication timeouts.

    protected ChannelFactoryBase (System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts timeouts);

    Parameters

    • timeouts
      IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts

      The IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts specifying the default timeouts for open, send, receive, and close operations when exchanging messages.

    Remarks

    Use ChannelFactoryBase instead of the default constructor if you want to specify custom values for the open, send, receive, and close operation timeouts instead of using the service model default values.

Properties

  • DefaultCloseTimeout

    Gets the default interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.

    protected override TimeSpan DefaultCloseTimeout { get; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The default TimeSpan that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.

    Remarks

    This value is set when creating a new ChannelFactoryBase object. The default ChannelFactoryBase() constructor sets the DefaultCloseTimeout property to a value of 1 minute. Use ChannelFactoryBase(IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts) if you want to specify another value for this timeout.

  • DefaultOpenTimeout

    Gets the default interval of time provided for an open operation to complete.

    protected override TimeSpan DefaultOpenTimeout { get; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The default TimeSpan that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out.

    Remarks

    This value is set when creating a new ChannelFactoryBase object. The default ChannelFactoryBase() constructor sets the DefaultOpenTimeout property to a value of 1 minute. Use ChannelFactoryBase(IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts) if you want to specify another value for this timeout.

  • DefaultReceiveTimeout

    Gets the default interval of time provided for a receive operation to complete.

    protected override TimeSpan DefaultReceiveTimeout { get; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The default TimeSpan that specifies how long the receive operation has to complete before timing out.

    Remarks

    This value is set when creating a new ChannelFactoryBase object. The default ChannelFactoryBase() constructor sets the DefaultReceiveTimeout property to a value of 10 minutes. Use ChannelFactoryBase(IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts) if you want to specify another value for this timeout.

  • DefaultSendTimeout

    Gets the default interval of time provided for a send operation to complete.

    protected override TimeSpan DefaultSendTimeout { get; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The default TimeSpan that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.

    Remarks

    This value is set when creating a new ChannelFactoryBase object. The default ChannelFactoryBase() constructor sets the DefaultSendTimeout property to a value of 1 minute. Use ChannelFactoryBase(IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts) if you want to specify another value for this timeout.

Methods

  • GetProperty<T>()

    Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

    public virtual T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;

    Returns

    • T

      The typed object T requested if it is present or null if it is not.

    Remarks

    Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel factory stack. If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. If not, it simply delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel factory layer supported the requested object, then the method returns null.

    This is similar to COM+â€™s QueryService interface.

  • OnAbort()

    Inserts processing on a communication object after it transitions to the closing state due to the invocation of a synchronous abort operation.

    protected override void OnAbort ();

    Remarks

    The default implementation is empty.

  • OnBeginClose(TimeSpan,AsyncCallback,Object)

    Begins an asynchronous operation to close each of the channels that were created by the factory.

    protected override IAsyncResult OnBeginClose (TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

    Parameters

    • timeout
      TimeSpan

      The TimeSpan that specifies how long the on close operation has to complete before timing out.

    • callback
      AsyncCallback

      The AsyncCallback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation on close completion.

    • state
      Object

      An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous on close operation.

    Returns

    • IAsyncResult

      The IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous on close operation.

  • OnClose(TimeSpan)

    Inserts processing on a communication object after it transitions into the opening state which must complete within a specified interval of time.

    protected override void OnClose (TimeSpan timeout);

    Parameters

    • timeout
      TimeSpan

      The TimeSpan that specifies how long the on close operation has to complete before timing out.

    Remarks

    The default implementation is empty.

  • OnEndClose(IAsyncResult)

    Completes an asynchronous operation to close channels that were opened by the factory.

    protected override void OnEndClose (IAsyncResult result);

    Parameters

    • result
      IAsyncResult

      The IAsyncResult returned by a call to the stem.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase.OnBeginClose* method.
